title.@value: Tetralogy of Fallot with pulmonary atresia

definition.@value: A congenital cardiovascular malformation that is a variant of tetralogy of Fallot in which there is no direct communication between the right ventricle and the pulmonary arterial tree.

label.@value: Tetralogy of Fallot with pulmonary atresia and systemic-to-pulmonary collateral artery
Tetralogy of Fallot with pulmonary atresia
Pulmonary atresia with ventricular septal defect [Fallot type]
